shortStory.title: Short Story
shortStory.text: <pTag> I'm <strongTag>Cyril</strongTag>, <strongTag>Web Developer</strongTag> based in Lyon, France. I design and build high-performance, reliable, elegant and responsive <strongTag>Web Applications</strongTag>. I work with the <strongTag>JavaScript</strongTag>, ecosystem, including <strongTag>React</strongTag> and <strongTag>Next.js</strongTag> ☀️.</pTag>

longStory.title: Long Story
longStory.text: Since march 2020, I've been learning Web Development to become a <strongTag> Full-Stack Developer</strongTag>, specialized in <strongTag> Front End</strongTag>. <brTag></brTag> In order to achieve this purpose, I have completed both <TheOdinProjectLink> The Odin Project </TheOdinProjectLink> and the <FullStackOpenLink> Full Stack Open</FullStackOpenLink> curriculums. Throughout those courses, I've been learning programming concepts and practical skills, realizing numerous concrete <ProjectsLink>Projects</ProjectsLink>. Since then, I have deeply enjoyed continuously learning and resolving problems.
